title: Slow cooker pulled pork
ingredients: ['1 (1.35kg) pork shoulder', '950ml water or as needed', '2 litres white vinegar or as needed', '4 tablespoons salt', '1 large onion, cut into 8 wedges', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 tablespoon ground mustard', '1 tablespoon chilli powder', '110g dark brown soft sugar']
